NODE_ENV.description: Node environment. node_modules packages can alter their behaviour when in production. Heroku will prune devPackages when in production.

BLOCKCHAIN_WEBSOCKET_PORT.description: Port at which it should allows peers to connect

BLOCKCHAIN_PEERS.description: Peers to which it should connect to sync blockchain

BLOCKCHAIN_INITIAL_DIFFICULTY.description: Initial difficulty for the blockchain (number of leading zeros in hash)

BLOCKCHAIN_MINING_RATE.description: Rate at which block should be included in blockchain (time in milliseconds)

BLOCKCHAIN_MINING_REWARD.description: Reward associated with mining a block
